Portfolio

SIBantu (Sistem Informasi Bantuan)

an information disclosure platform that allows people to register themselves as aid participants

Satu Data Bojonegoro

a government data management policy that aims to create quality data, easily accessible, and can be shared between Central and Regional Agencies

MPP Bojonegoro

The Bojonegoro Regency Public Service Mall is an effort by the Bojonegoro Regency Government in providing fast and appropriate services to the community

SiTabah

GIS application for management and grouping of places of worship as well as administrators of places of worship in bojonegoro

K'POB

Bojonegoro Sports Potential Card Application An application for the bojonegoro community who have sports potential and want to register themselves to become athletes who make the name of Bojonegoro proud
